reviewText: Excellent book about the a Pope who is refreshing and ready to make the changes in the Catholic faith that have long been ignored

I think Pope Francis is a saint.  I respect and love him and his messages about what we are doing to our world and it's creatures.  He brings hope - a factor in this video.  Anyone who feels as I do about Pope Francis will probably want this DVD for their collection.
Another winner about this splendid Man.

Excellent overview of Pope Francis' journey to the Vatican- gives in sight to the man who would be Pope.  Catholics and other Christians will appreciate the simplicity, humility and his commitment to the poor among us, which is well demonstrated in this film.  There are parts where the narration is in Spanish with sub titles, but this does not in my opinion distract the viewer.
Who doesnt luv this pope!  My word a great book and definitely purchase again....
